author: Special Corresponent
title: SRK, Priyanka Chopra part of Lady Gaga’s ‘One World’ concert to raise funds for COVID-19 pandemic
description: The star-studded virtual live event will also feature artistes such as Elton John, Paul McCartney, Billie Eilish among others
content: Bollywood superstars Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra will be part of Global Citizen and World Health Organisations star-studded One World: Together At Home live virtual event to raise funds in the fight against the COVID-19 pandemic. It has been curated by… [+3602 chars]
